alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Powell, Estill, western Lee and southwestern Wolfe Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pitts, or near Irvine, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cobhill and Rogers Chapel around 145 PM EDT. Pryse, Texola, Patsey, See and Pilot around 150 PM EDT. Crystal, Shade, Leighton and Alumbaugh around 155 PM EDT. Whynot, Old Landing, Pinnacle, Greeley, Evelyn, Standing Rock and Leeco around 200 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Willow Shoals, Fixer, Zoe, Zachariah, Mount Olive and Yellow Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
